name: Precious
headline: AI to curate your baby photos
description:
Precious is the iPhone app that tells the story of your children growing up.

Using Artificial Intelligence, the app automatically finds the best baby pics on your phone, and then creates deliciously cute photo stories for you.

Our vision is to help all families capture the joy of childhood. To do this, we are building the platform for preserving, enjoying & sharing your family's memories.
generated_description:
### The Precious Company Overview

**Company Name:** Precious  
**Founded:** Part of Y Combinator Batch W18  
**Location:** San Francisco, CA  
**Size:** Team of 7 Employees  
**Website:** [preciousapp.com](https://preciousapp.com/)  

#### Mission

Precious is on a heartfelt mission: to harness the power of artificial intelligence to curate and celebrate baby photos. The core aim is to help families capture the fleeting joy of childhood through beautifully crafted stories.

#### What They Do

The Precious app is designed to effortlessly curate and organize your baby pictures. It automatically identifies the best images on your device and transforms them into engaging formats—think timelapse videos, monthly albums, and plenty of adorable photo art. For busy parents, this means capturing precious moments without the hassle of manual editing.

The app’s functionalities include:
- **Adorable Photo Art:** Enhance your memories with fun stickers and frames to highlight milestones.
- **Time Lapse Videos:** Show how fast your baby grows by creating time-lapse videos from your photos.
- **Automatic Albums:** Never lose track of your memories; the app organizes your photos by month and year.
- **Photo Calendar:** Visually track your baby’s progress through monthly snapshots.

You can easily share these memorable keepsakes with friends and family, making every photo yours to treasure forever.

#### User Experience

The feedback from users has been overwhelmingly positive. Many parents appreciate how the app simplifies the photo editing process, allowing them to focus on enjoying their children rather than getting bogged down by the intricacies of photo management. Comments often highlight the app’s ease of use, quick operation, and the delightful surprise of new artwork generated each day.

#### Why It Matters

In a world where time flies, and childhood moments are fleeting, Precious offers a pragmatic solution for families. It not only makes memory capturing enjoyable but also builds a lasting archive of experiences to savor long after the childhood years have passed. 

So, if you’ve got a little one and you’re looking for a way to preserve those adorable moments without sacrificing your time, give Precious a look. It might just become your favorite parenting tool.
